mapper.select: SELECT USER_PASSWORD_HISTORY.user_id, USER_PASSWORD_HISTORY.password_hash, USER_PASSWORD_HISTORY.password_salt, USER_PASSWORD_HISTORY.password_date FROM USER_PASSWORD_HISTORY JOIN GUACAMOLE_USER ON USER_PASSWORD_HISTORY.user_id = GUACAMOLE_USER.user_id WHERE GUACAMOLE_USER.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY USER_PASSWORD_HISTORY.password_date DESC LIMIT #{maxHistorySize}
